#include<stdio.h>
#define sc(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define scll(i) scanf("%lld",&i)
#define prntLL(i) printf("%lld\n",i)
#define ll long long
ll gcd(ll a , ll b){
    if(b == 0)
        return a;
    return gcd(b , a%b);
}
int main(){
    int t;
    ll x1 , y1 , x2 , y2;
    sc(t);
    while(t--){
        scll(x1);scll(y1);scll(x2);scll(y2);
        ll difx = (x1 > x2 ? x1-x2 : x2-x1);
        ll dify = (y1 > y2 ? y1 - y2 : y2 - y1);
        if(difx && dify){
            if(difx < dify){
                difx = difx^dify;
                dify = difx^dify;
                difx = difx^dify;
            }
            ll res = difx+dify-gcd(difx,dify);
            prntLL(res);
        }
        else{
            puts("0");
        }
    }
}
